original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.18:1. Recommendation:  change background to #7f9f3d.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h2

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (134.5px by 15px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 22.8px instead of at least 24px.
